name: Eyes of the Night
summary: You can see in the darkness as easily as a true vampire.
description:
You can see in the darkness as easily as a true vampire. You gain darkvision.

Special You can select this feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain into or out of this feat.Traits

Dhampir: A creature with this trait has the dhampir versatile heritage. These humanoids are the mortal offspring of vampires and members of other ancestries.
